short_summary: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada seeks a contractor to provide electrical services St-Hyacinthe
description: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada's Saint-Hyacinthe Research and Development Centre wishes to establish a standing offer with one (1) electrical contractor for electrical system maintenance, repair and installation services at its centre located at 3600 Casavant Boulevard West, Saint-Hyacinthe, Quebec J2S 8E3.
tags: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*Services d'entrepreneurs en \\u00e9lectricit\\u00e9 licenci\\u00e9 de cat\\u00e9gorie A
*Accord sur les march\\u00e9s publics de l'\\u00e9 Organisation mondiale du commerce (AMP-OMC)
